results.name: Largest squarefree number dividing central binomial coefficient A000984(n).
mathematica: a[n_] := Times @@ FactorInteger[Binomial[2n, n]][[All, 1]]; Array[a, 26, 0] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 04 2019 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 19 2003
